# aes-text-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute    | Description                                                                  | Type                                                                        | Default     |
| -------------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`   | Whether or not this is a disabled field.                                     | `boolean`                                                                   | `undefined` |
| `fieldName`    | `field-name` | The name of the field.                                                       | `string`                                                                    | `undefined` |
| `fieldType`    | `field-type` | The type of text field.                                                      | `"email" \| "number" \| "password" \| "search" \| "tel" \| "text" \| "url"` | `'text'`    |
| `hideLabel`    | `hide-label` | Whether or not the label should be hidden.                                   | `boolean`                                                                   | `undefined` |
| `inputOptions` | --           | Object of options for the input field. (Ex. { minlength: 5, maxlength: 10 }) | `{ [name: string]: string; }`                                               | `undefined` |
| `labelText`    | `label-text` | The text for the label.                                                      | `string`                                                                    | `undefined` |
| `required`     | `required`   | Whether or not this is a required field.                                     | `boolean`                                                                   | `undefined` |
